summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.5°C) and outside temperature (down 2.8°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 6%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 6923 lux) and cloud levels (up 519 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1450 m), light levels (up 9143 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.4°C), and outside temperature (up 3.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 518.7m lower than yesterday, 1079.0m lower than past week, 1450.1m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1354.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2430m and 2800m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Possible light showers, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather could become unsettled.
